I have been here many times. In my opinion, this is the best karaoke bar in Zhongshan.The bartender Jun has a good personality and enthusiastic.The KTV system has a large number of English, Chinese, and Japanese songs.Drinks are cheap -not top -level, but cheaper than most bars in the area.Make sure they send them messages and call in advance -they are busy, you can't always walk in with a group of people.They usually have only 2-3 employees, so if they are crowded, they may be very busy -to be patient and ensure communication with them.

Edit: It is necessary to emphasize the previous message part.Add them to Instagram or get the LINE of the boss.Sometimes work hours are not consistent, so please consult him before planning.
